background: Deploy a brand-new, YAML-only CloudFormation stack (TapStack.yml) in us-east-1 to implement advanced observability for a high-volume payment processing system. Build everything new with ENVIRONMENT_SUFFIX-based naming and encryption-by-default. Configure KMS-backed CloudWatch Log Groups, metric filters for business KPIs, Synthetics canary checks, anomaly detectors, and Contributor Insights. Enable X-Ray tracing, composite alarms with SNS actions (local and optional central), and an EventBridge remediation path. Publish a multi-panel CloudWatch Dashboard and optional OAM Link for cross-account visibilityâ€”aligned with least-privilege IAM and production best practices.
author: iqbala-turing
